20110118190400.000|20110118190404.000|CC1|HE'S DOING PASSWORD.

20110118190517.000|20110118190519.000|CC1|HAVING DONE IT 15 YEARS WITH HIM

20110118190538.000|20110118190539.000|CC1|I THINK HE'D LIKE TO RATHER BE

20110118190544.000|20110118190545.000|CC1|I GOT A FEELING HE HAS SOME

20110118190550.000|20110118190552.000|CC1|OUT OF YEAR AND THEN THE REST OF
20110118190552.000|20110118190555.000|CC1|THE YEAR TRAVEL.

20110118190555.000|20110118190556.000|CC1|CAN DO.

20110118190601.000|20110118190602.000|CC1|WHITE CAN SAY THAT IN THEIR     
20110118190602.000|20110118190604.000|CC1|80'S?                           
20110118190604.000|20110118190605.000|CC1|>>  HE'LL BE 80 NEXT AUGUST.    
20110118190605.000|20110118190607.000|CC1|>>  BY THE WAY, I THINK HE'S    
20110118190607.000|20110118190610.000|CC1|GOING TO MOVE INTO DONALD       
20110118190610.000|20110118190613.000|CC1|TRUMP'S HOME ON PALM BEACH AND

20110118190617.000|20110118190618.000|CC1|>>  I CALLED HIM LAST WEEK TO   
20110118190618.000|20110118190619.000|CC1|HAVE DINNER, WE WERE SITTING ON 
20110118190619.000|20110118190622.000|CC1|THE TARMAC TRYING TO GET DOWN

20110118190624.000|20110118190626.000|CC1|>> WHO IS HE GOING TO REPLACE?  
20110118190626.000|20110118190627.000|CC1|>>  REPLACEMENT, FORGET ABOUT   
20110118190627.000|20110118190627.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110118190627.000|20110118190629.000|CC1|LET'S TALK ABOUT THE LEGACY     
20110118190629.000|20110118190630.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110118190630.000|20110118190631.000|CC1|WHAT IS THE GREAT CONTRIBUTION  
20110118190631.000|20110118190634.000|CC1|DO YOU THINK OF -- IF WE HAD TO 
20110118190634.000|20110118190635.000|CC1|PUT THE LEGACY AS TIGHT AS WE   
20110118190635.000|20110118190640.000|CC1|CAN, WHAT WOULD IT BE?          
20110118190640.000|20110118190641.000|CC1|>>  I REMEMBER REEG TELLING THE 
20110118190641.000|20110118190644.000|CC1|STORY OF WHEN HE WAS A PAGE AT  
20110118190644.000|20110118190645.000|CC1|NBC AND WHEN HE WOULD LOOK AT   
20110118190645.000|20110118190648.000|CC1|WHAT OTHER GUYS DID THAT HE     
20110118190648.000|20110118190648.000|CC1|RESPECTED SO MUCH.              
20110118190648.000|20110118190651.000|CC1|THE JACK PARS, THE DIFFERENT MEN
20110118190651.000|20110118190653.000|CC1|WHO WERE -- JOHNNY CARSONS THAT 
20110118190653.000|20110118190655.000|CC1|WERE SO GREAT AT IT.            
20110118190655.000|20110118190656.000|CC1|REEG COULD NEVER BELIEVE THAT HE
20110118190656.000|20110118190659.000|CC1|GOT TO BE ONE OF THOSE GUYS.    
20110118190659.000|20110118190701.000|CC1|THERE WAS A PART OF HIM, THAT   
20110118190701.000|20110118190702.000|CC1|PART THAT CAME FROM THE BRONX   
20110118190702.000|20110118190704.000|CC1|WHOSE MOM USED TO SAY TO HIM,   
20110118190704.000|20110118190706.000|CC1|LISTEN, MR. SMARTY PANTS, THE   
20110118190706.000|20110118190708.000|CC1|POORHOUSE IS JUST AROUND THE    
20110118190708.000|20110118190709.000|CC1|CORNER WITH HIS ITALIAN ACCENT  
20110118190709.000|20110118190712.000|CC1|AND I THINK PART OF REGIS       
20110118190712.000|20110118190713.000|CC1|BELIEVES THAT AND COULDN'T      
20110118190713.000|20110118190715.000|CC1|BELIEVE THAT HE HAS HAD THE     
20110118190715.000|20110118190719.000|CC1|GREAT FORTUNE TO NOT ONLY MAKE  
20110118190719.000|20110118190720.000|CC1|THIS KIND OF A LIVING IN TERMS  
20110118190720.000|20110118190721.000|CC1|OF FINANCIALLY ALL THESE YEARS  
20110118190721.000|20110118190722.000|CC1|BUT TO DO SOMETHING HE LOVES SO 
20110118190722.000|20110118190724.000|CC1|MUCH.                           
20110118190724.000|20110118190725.000|CC1|AND TO BE THAT GUY THAT
